Java-Kryptoknight

Introduction

What's in this package

In this package you can find the Java implementation of the IBM-Kryptoknight protocol. IBM developed this protocol for authentication especially for devices with limited calculation abilities such as small microcontrollers. Here the implementation is made in Java. This will make it possible to authenticate several PC to eachother or to authenticate a microcontroller to a PC. In contrast with the AVR-Kryptoknight package for the Atmel ATMEGA8535 microcontroller, this package can function as a station waiting for an authentication request. This is the so called BOB-mode. The other available mode is the ALICE-mode. Alice always starts the authentication procedure.
